title: Fix deployment errors

requirements.text: Diagnose and resolve all deployment errors preventing the application from successfully building and deploying to the Internet Computer network
acceptanceCriteria: Application deploys successfully to the Internet Computer
All canisters are operational after deployment
Frontend can successfully connect to backend canister

requirements.text: Validate that all Motoko backend code follows single-actor architecture with proper type definitions and no syntax errors
acceptanceCriteria: All public methods have correct type signatures
No orphaned or malformed function definitions

requirements.text: Ensure all frontend imports and component references are valid with no missing dependencies or circular imports
acceptanceCriteria: All React components render without runtime errors
No missing or incorrect import paths

constraints: Do not modify immutable frontend paths (useInternetIdentity, useActor, main.tsx, components/ui)
nonGoals: Changing the visual design or styling
